articles.author: Emily Peck
articles.title: Trump tariffs would hit lower-income Americans hardest - Axios
articles.description: Tariffs are another blow to people struggling with higher prices.
articles.content:
Tariff pain is not shared equally: The less money you make, the more President Trump's proposed higher taxes on imports will hurt.
Why it matters: Tariffs are another blow to lower-income earners al… [+1375 chars]
